system.requirements:
.Servitor Comrade: Jovian-Pattern Gun Servitor
Apt: Ballistic Skill, Offence
system.descriptionText:
Order can only be made to Servitor Comrade Weapon Capable of Semi/Full Auto Fire. Character Designates a 45 Degree Arc Kill Zone that Comrade will unleash a Suppressing Fire Action in.
Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.

description.value: Order can only be made to Servitor Comrade Weapon Capable of Semi/Full Auto Fire. Character Designates a 45 Degree Arc Kill Zone that Comrade will unleash a Suppressing Fire Action in. Attack Orders have Attack Action Subtype, counts as Player's Attack for the turn.
